net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm
Interface MessageStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerMessageStore
public interface MessageStore

Interface for message storage objects. These objects hold messages before they are sent into the transport mechanisms.

Field Summary
static int RC_FAILED
          Communications failure.
static int RC_SUCCEEDED
          Communications transmission successful.
static int RC_UNKNOWN
          Communications status unknown.
 
Method Summary
 void endConnection(int connectionRc)
          Communication with remote host finished.
 void getMessagesToSend(java.util.Vector msgList)
          Get the messages to send to the remote host.
 void startConnection()
          Called on the start of communicating with a remote host.
 

Field Detail

RC_FAILED

static final int RC_FAILED
Communications failure. Failure during communications, messages should be resent if possible.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RC_UNKNOWN

static final int RC_UNKNOWN
Communications status unknown. It can not be determined if the messages were successfully communicated or not.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RC_SUCCEEDED

static final int RC_SUCCEEDED
Communications transmission successful. The messages can be deleted from the MessageStore.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
